mean_cn: adj. 直接的，率直的；  vt. 指导，引导，管理，导演；  adv. 直接地，径直地
mean_en: going the shortest distance from one place to another :going straight without turning or stopping
short_phrase: a direct shot to the center
sentence: The direct flight is more time-saving than transit flight.
sentence_trans: 直达航班比中转航班更省时。
